fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication
head_office_address: Tesco PLC Falcon Way Shire Park, Hertfordshire
eu_initiatives: Tesco serves millions of customers every week so we are interested in a wide range of issues and policy areas that affect the way we serve our customers. Alongside our core purpose of 'serving shoppers a little better every day', we are committed to creating a business where colleagues can get on, whatever their background; to helping our customers make healthier choices and enjoy good quality, sustainable products, at affordable prices; and to helping make sure no food that could be eaten is wasted, anywhere in our supply chain.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: As one of the world’s largest retailers with over 450,000 colleagues, we serve millions of customers a week in our stores and online.
